page.title: 03A day in the life of...
page.content: Children in my school seem to have very similar life styles.I get up at 7.00am and get dressed. At about 7.15am I have my breakfast of cereal and a drink of tea. At about 8.15am I call for my friend Karen Bailey who lives down the road from me.I go to St Bernards Junior school and it starts at 8.40am.In the morning we do our basic work.At 10.30am we have playtime.At 12.00 it is dinner time and some children have school dinners but I bring packed lunches.Sometimes after dinner I go on the computer.We have lessons from 1.15,playtime from 2.20-2.30 and we go home at 3.15pm.Sometimes after school I play with Karen and after tea I often watch T.V.and go to bed at about 10.00pm.
